description: Upon request, they have added a pair of shorts to their Tind product line. It is based on their bestseller, the Tind Jogger, so they know the fit is just right. Made from the same Fine Merino as the other styles in the Tind family, knitted into a jacquard, structured fabric, this is their take on classical sportswear that is usually only available in cotton. Pair the shorts with the matching Tind Hoodie, and your favorite sneakers.
name: We Norwegians Tind Shorts - Mens
